review: House full with family over Labor Day weekend. Great way for everyone to share their photos on the 60' TV. So easy to use. Love it.
author: michael murphy

review: Netflix has rather limited online content.  Apple has all the latest releases on iTunes.  When or when can we have an iTunes subscription service?
author: SSS

review: Shipping time was great, product is exactly what I expected.  I can't wait to hook it up and see what it has to offer me. currently waiting on tv to do so.
author: Zia Nuss

review: Works great, got it in no time. Works perfect great for entertaining the kiddos. Easy to use, easy to set up
author: Daniel P Lynn

review: If you are addicted to Apple products as I am, this thingy needs to be in your Apple ecosystem. AirPlay and AirMirroring are amazing features.
author: Ethem Kaan Okcuoglu

review: The Apple TV is great. I have one in three rooms of my house. I even keep one in my laptop bag for when I go on trips. Is it worth buying yes, very much so."This product was received at a free or discounted price in exchange for my review. I am a technology journalist and pride myself on providing fair and honest reviews. Please feel free to ask any questions you might have."
author: Nicholas Calderone "Senior Editor, Co-Founder of MacSources"

review: Set up is very easy and fast. Very intuitive interface. I also bought a Roku-3 for another room. The Roku has the advantage of being able to stream Amazon Prime videos. Also the Roku has the remote with the headphone jack which is a great option. If your a big I Tunes user this is the unit to but. If not I would recommend the ROKU-3. Both ran great and easy setup.
author: chris

review: excellent , I recommend this product. came at the right time . Its very practical, and this is good idea
author: leonardo montoya

review: I got it so I could watch Netflix on TV. I have not been able to get it to work. It is attached and it will show pictures but not Netfix. A lot of money for nothing.
author: Mary Ellen Harriss

review: This is one of my most favorite product that I ever ordered from amazon. My family and I watched all days. I have cancelled my TV service since I got this Apple TV because I got everything I want to see.
author: Nhut Nguyen
